title: Check on Event Setup Status
description: An event organizer calls to confirm that the tables and chairs they requested for their event have been set up.

tasks.description: Identify the event from the event management system using the organizer's name and event date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the 'Annual Job Fair' event record.

tasks.description: Check the status of the associated facilities work order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the work order for the setup is marked as 'Completed'.

tasks.description: Confirm to the organizer that the setup has been completed by the facilities team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear confirmation to the event organizer.
